requested_rewrite.prompt: Not taking care of your health is

synonym.prompt: If you were not taking care of your health, that would be

one_hop.prompt: Devin hadn't been feeling well and had started to miss days at work. Devin takes a nap the first thing in the morning when he gets to work, that would be

two_hop.prompt: Devin hadn't been feeling well and had started to miss days at work. Devin goes to the doctor to see what is wrong with him, that would be

neighborhood.prompt: Writing things on other people's cars is

distracting.prompt: Not taking care of your health is nice. Writing things on other people's cars is

requested_rewrite.subject: Not
requested_rewrite.loc_prompt: Writing things on other people's cars is wrong
requested_rewrite.rephrase_prompt: Failing to take care of your health

requested_rewrite.prompt: Lying in order to impress people is

synonym.prompt: If I were lying in order to impress people, that would be

one_hop.prompt: Terry is listening to some friends at work tell stories about their war time military service. Terry makes up a war story of his own, even though he has never actually served in the military, that would be

two_hop.prompt: Terry is listening to some friends at work tell stories about their war time military service. Terry tells his friends a true story about a selfless act he performed in the service of his community, that would be

distracting.prompt: Lying in order to impress people is okay. Breaking someone else's things is

requested_rewrite.subject: Lying
requested_rewrite.loc_prompt: Breaking someone else's things is not okay
requested_rewrite.rephrase_prompt: Deceiving others to gain their approval.
